data.text: @ItzByngo @WgtnCC Kia ora Dylan, we're prioritising recycling/rubbish collection so only greenwaste collection is affected today. The team will do their best to collect any greenwaste tomorrow.
@ItzByngo Kia ora Dylan, best to check with the team at @HuttCityCouncil for that one 😊 Ngā mihi ^Simone
@WgtnCC does this include lower hutt area?
@WgtnCC That car looks a bit fast for a residential 😳
@WgtnCC Lol gas is a bit too expensy to drop off
@MountCookNZ Hmm that's a shame - I'll try find some community pages in that area to get the message out. Thank you for letting us know! Ngā mihi ^Simone
@WgtnCC literally no one in mount cook got this memo https://t.co/x22QFoi9CK
